title: Puff pastry party canapés
description: These three recipes work really well together and should provide something for everyone. The best thing about this trio is that they can be prepared well in advance and can all be cooked together in the same oven at the same time for a Christmas party.
serves: Makes 28 sausage rolls, 20 palmiers, 24 cheese straws
ingredients: 2 free-range eggs, beaten with a pinch of salt
1 free-range egg, beaten with a pinch of salt
